topics.body:
Random post:
So cause I'm going for video game design I've learned a metric fuck ton about things about designing things when it comes to cgi and shit.


Like often times less is more when it comes to 3d modeling and that.

On the one hand P.T. looks fucking incredible cause when you get down to it's only one building so they could spend drastically more time on it.

On the other hand there's games that have too much in it for that even if you have enough money it's still going to look terrible close up simply because there's a point at which it's literally not possible for your workers to work that hard and put actual effort into it.  Even if you had all the money in the world you literally can not make say a thousand hour game and everything look amazingly detailed simply because of the logistics of trying to model everything.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
